item.title: Into to R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can change the format of the text: italics - text bold - text You can even make titles: text text text text text text You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min.
